welcome_message:
Welcome to the minimal Databricks Asset Bundle template!

This template creates a minimal project structure without sample code, ideal for advanced users.
(For getting started with Python or SQL code, use the default-python or default-sql templates instead.)

Your workspace at {{workspace_host}} is used for initialization.
(See https://docs.databricks.com/dev-tools/cli/profiles.html for how to change your profile.)

template_name.//: This property is always set to 'default-minimal'

project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, and underscores.

include_job.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-minimal
include_job.description: Include a job that runs a notebook

include_pipeline.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-minimal

include_python.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-minimal
include_python.description: Include a sample Python package that builds into a wheel file

serverless.//: This property is always set to 'yes' for default-minimal

default_catalog.description: Default catalog for any tables created by this project{{if eq (default_catalog) ""}} (leave blank when not using Unity Catalog){{end}}

personal_schemas.description:
Use a personal schema for each user working on this project.
(This is recommended. Your personal schema will be '{{.default_catalog}}.{{short_name}}'.)
enum: no, I will customize the schema configuration later in databricks.yml

language.//: Derived from language_choice: for Python, pyproject.toml and tests are included; for others they are excluded
language.description: Derived language property for template logic

lakeflow_only.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-minimal

enable_pydabs.//: This property is always set to 'no' for default-minimal
enable_pydabs.description: Use Python instead of YAML for resource definitions
